sources.title: Face to Face
sources.description: Title: Face to Face Summary: Two stories. In the first, a sea captain has to conceal a man's presence aboard ship from his crew. In the second, a Wild West lawman has to deal with a troublemaker bent on bloodshed before he can concentrate on matrimony. Directed by: John Brahm, Bretaigne Windust Actors: Production Company: Theasquare Productions Release Date: November 1952 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Two stories. In the first, a sea captain has to conceal a man's presence aboard ship from his crew. In the second, a Wild West lawman has to deal with a troublemaker bent on bloodshed before he can concentrate on matrimony.

metadata.Plot: Two stories. In the first, a sea captain has to conceal a man's presence aboard ship from his crew. In the second, a Wild West lawman has to deal with a troublemaker bent on bloodshed before he can concentrate on matrimony.
metadata.Writer: James Agee, Joseph Conrad, Stephen Crane
metadata.Actors: James Mason, Gene Lockhart, Michael Pate
